description: Virtual Machines in the VMware environment are automatically migrated to the Amazon cloud.
constraints: Only supports Windows Server 2003, Windows Server 2003 R2 and Windows Server 2008 (Datacenter, Enterprise, and Standard editions)

description: Virtual Machines in the Microsoft Hyper-V environment are automatically migrated to the Amazon cloud.
constraints: Only supports Windows Server 2003, Windows Server 2003 R2 and Windows Server 2008 (Datacenter, Enterprise, and Standard editions)

description: Virtual Machines in the Citrix Xen environment are migrated to the Amazon cloud.
constraints: Only supports Windows Server 2003, Windows Server 2003 R2 and Windows Server 2008 (Datacenter, Enterprise, and Standard editions)

audience: This workshop is for management and technical personnel who are considering moving a significant number of applications to the AWS cloud.
description: The workshop provides a methodical look at the considerations of making a large-scale move to the AWS cloud. It covers the financial considerations, technical obstacles, common methods and reviews a template plan for making the move.  The workshop covers common issues like moving shared storage, migrating IP/DNS addresses, migrating network routing tables and firewall settings, etc.
constraints: Recommend that fewer than 8 attend the workshop.

audience: Technical personnel including architects, engineers and operations specialists
description: ‘Architecture Days’ are interactive sessions where your team and an expert in AWS discuss your projects and possible solutions for deploying it on the Amazon cloud.
constraints: Recommend that fewer than 8 attend the workshop.

audience: Technical personnel including architects, engineers and operations specialists
description: 8 hours of online training material covering the fundamentals of the AWS cloud offering including: Images & instances, Elastic IP’s, Security Groups, Virtual Private Clouds (VPC), Identity & Access Management, Simple Storage and more.
constraints: Video is available to one user for a single viewing. Additional seats can be purchased.
